title: Alphabets and Sounds
content: Pupils learn the 26 letters of the alphabet (A–Z) and the sounds they make. Practice by singing the alphabet song.

title: Simple Words
content: Children learn to form and read small words using letters and sounds.

title: Basic Sentences
content: Pupils learn how to put words together to make short sentences.

title: Reading Short Stories
content: Children practice reading simple storybooks with pictures to improve fluency.
examples: The cat sat on the mat.

title: Rhyming Words
content: Pupils learn words that sound alike, helping with phonics and spelling.

title: Nouns and Verbs
content: Children are introduced to nouns (naming words) and verbs (action words).

title: Picture Reading
content: Pupils look at pictures and describe what they see to build vocabulary.
examples: A picture of a dog 🐕 → The dog is running.
A picture of a girl 👧 → The girl is smiling.

title: Opposites
content: Pupils learn words that mean the opposite of each other.

title: Listening Skills
content: Children practice listening carefully to short instructions and stories.

title: Simple Dictation
content: Pupils practice writing simple words or short sentences dictated by the teacher.
